name: Omnimon_Merciful_Mode
description: Omnimon Merciful Mode is an Omnimon with green eyes, light blue neon lights in many parts of its body, which were inspired by Kamen Rider and Kikaider  , and light blueish white wings which were designed to be similar to scarves, which were inspired by Kamen Rider as well,  instead of a cape. Its sword, known as the Fearsome Blade, resembles a katana , which was chosen due to the katana's Japanese influence.
